educational_standards.description: Identify the nets of pyramids and prisms.

Represent three-dimensional figures using nets made up of rectangles and triangles, and use the nets to find the surface area of these figures. Apply these techniques in the context of solving real-world and mathematical problems.

educational_standards.display_name: Surface Area of Cubes and Rectangular Prisms
educational_standards.description: Calculate the surface area of cubes and rectangular prisms.
Calculate the surface area of triangular prisms.
Calculate the surface area of pyramids.
Solve mathematical problems involving the surface area of three-dimensional objects.
Solve real-world problems involving the surface area of three-dimensional objects.
